DOC.detailed_description: This study single ( Part A ) multiple ( Part B ) dose study . Following informed consent screening , 10 eligible subject receive single dose Thetanix placebo clinic . A Safety Review Committee review safety data Day 7 first ten subject determine appropriate continue Part B 10 subject receive 15 dos Thetanix placebo twice daily dose regimen 7.5 day . In part study , 8 10 subject randomly receive Thetanix 2 subject randomly receive placebo . Each dose consist three capsule . Subjects Part B receive first last dose clinic take 13 dos home . While home , subject require answer question health , record body temperature take capsule electronic diary . Subjects develop fever undergo assessment , include blood culture . Subjects provide stool sample analysis microbiota faecal calprotectin .
